description: Try our easy to follow Chipotle Chicken & Bacon Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken burger,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,Roast,Tree nut free,Mince,Tomato,Chicken
name: Chipotle Chicken & Bacon Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 140g McCormick grill mates chipotle & roasted garlic dry marinade

recipeInstructions.text: Mix chicken mince with McCormick Grill Mates Chipotle & Roasted Garlic Dry Marinade, breadcrumbs and egg. Shape into 8 burgers.
BBQ or panfry bacon and the burgers over a medium heat, cook burgers for 5-7 minutes each side.
Place a generous serve of STUBB’S Original BBQ Sauce on bottom half of hamburger buns, then bacon, burgers and tomato slices, add a dollop of mayonnaise and top with the other bun half.
Serve with hot chips with extra STUBB’S Original BBQ Sauce for dipping.
